title: Communicating NRDAR Science: Translating Contaminant Data to Art
cleaned_text: Communicating NRDAR Science: Translating Contaminant Data to Art Video Transcript Detailed Description The NRDAR science webinar series highlights expertise, data, and information developed for NRDAR cases or for potential new methods application. In this presentation, Mallery Quetawki describes her work turning contaminant data into art for communicating science to Native American communities. Details Sources/Usage Public Domain.
